title: Lent Week 3 with Dr. Bryan Loritts
description:
We are excited to have Dr. Bryan Loritts, author, pastor, and speaker, joining Raechel and Amanda for week 3 of Lent 2022: Come to Life. The prophets and the season of Lent provide a unique and rich opportunity for believers to examine our own hearts and the idols of our own making, and be reminded of our need for a Savior. Join them as they discuss God’s call, not to religion, but to repent and turn back to Him, trusting that He is the only one who can give us a new heart. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 3 of the She Reads Truth Lent 2022: Come to Life reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Title collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/lent-week-3-with-dr-bryan-loritts
